wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
For a mature Python library to do XML to object serialization, take a look at lxml.objectify.
http://codespeak.net/lxml/objectify.html
You really should try FePy. FePy doesn't run lxml.objectify yet (this one is a monster), but it does run gnosis.xml.objectify. And it runs same on CPython too.
It is impressive that you could cook up XML to object serializer in relative short time and code, but I personally won't use any IronPython-only solution when there are lots of mature Python solutions.
